Notes.Text:
This update for cups fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-8675: Fixed a stack buffer overflow in libcups's asn1_get_type function(bsc#1146358). 
- CVE-2019-8696: Fixed a stack buffer overflow in libcups's asn1_get_packed function (bsc#1146359).	  
- Fixed a double free which was triggered by Java application (bsc#959478).

Vulnerabilities.Description: A buffer overflow issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixed in macOS Mojave 10.14.6, Security Update 2019-004 High Sierra, Security Update 2019-004 Sierra. An attacker in a privileged network position may be able to execute arbitrary code.
